verses.text: In thee, O LORD , do I put my trust: Let me never be put to confusion.
Deliver me in thy righteousness, and cause me to escape: Incline thine ear unto me, and save me.
Be thou my strong habitation, whereunto I may continually resort:
Deliver me, O my God, out of the hand of the wicked,
For thou art my hope, O Lord GOD :
By thee have I been holden up from the womb:
I am as a wonder unto many;
Let my mouth be filled with thy praise
Cast me not off in the time of old age;
For mine enemies speak against me;
saying,
O God, be not far from me:
Let them be confounded and consumed that are adversaries to my soul;
But I will hope continually,
My mouth shall shew forth thy righteousness and thy salvation all the day;
I will go in the strength of the Lord GOD :
O God, thou hast taught me from my youth:
Now also when I am old and greyheaded, O God, forsake me not;
Thy righteousness also, O God, is very high,
Thou , which hast shewed me great and sore troubles, shalt quicken me again,
Thou shalt increase my greatness,
I will also praise thee with the psaltery, even thy truth, O my God:
My lips shall greatly rejoice when I sing unto thee;
My tongue also shall talk of thy righteousness all the day long:
